Name: Bob Hearts Abishola
Title: Welcome to Lagos
Desc: After Bob and Abishola land in Lagos, they rush to rescue Dele from his dad's place.
LongDescription: After Bob and Abishola land in Lagos, they rush to rescue Dele from his dad's place; Auntie Olu and Uncle Tunde explore their old stomping grounds and realize things have changed since their last visit to Nigeria.
